name: PULSE (Beta 1.0)
description:
Shoot up the horde invading your world in this CGA colored high score game!

Welcome to PULSE. "The Horde", a mysterious group of aliens, have begun a massive attack over your homeland, Paraslixox. As part of the military, it's your job to shoot down every last one of The Horde until they surrender. 

Aim for high scores in 3 modes: Classic, Siege, and Defender, with 5 more modes upcoming! Fight various types of enemies with more on the way, and collect powerups in battle to improve your weapon.

Although the game is in it's early development stages, it is not easy! Getting cornered by enemies can easily occur and you must always watch your back. You only have 3 lives each battle, so tread carefully.

The in-game soundtrack is from the Geometry Wars series, composed by Chris Chudley. This is placeholder music, and the original soundtrack will be on it's way.
